name: Type-6 Transporter
description: A dependable trader, the Type-6 offers good cargo capacity at a low price. It's a great choice for newer pilots looking to scale up their cargo runs.

name: Type-7 Transporter
description: The Type-7 is a dedicated cargo hauler designed for maximum transport capacity on a medium pad. It's commonly used for mining support and mid-level trading.

name: Type-8 Transporter
description: The Type-8 is the spiritual successor to the Type-7, offering better internals, stronger defensive capability, and a fighter bay. It's ideal for bulk transport in dangerous regions.

name: Keelback
description: A hybrid trader with access to a fighter bay, the Keelback is used for mining, support roles, and light transport missions. Its flexibility makes it a favorite among mission runners.
strengths: Fighter bay on a medium pad

name: Python
description: The Python is a medium-padded juggernaut—capable of combat, trading, mining, or exploration. It's often regarded as the best all-rounder in the galaxy.
strengths: Huge cargo potential on medium pads

name: Orca
description: The Orca is a stylish Saud Kruger passenger liner used for sightseeing and luxury tours. It’s sleek, fast, and easily modded for exploration or stealth transport.

name: Dolphin
description: The Dolphin is the smallest of the Saud Kruger luxury vessels. Often used for light passenger runs, it's also a surprising favorite among explorers for its heat efficiency.
